title: SET_WAVE_QUAD_AMPLITUDE
content:
0xE4174B7B// SetWaveQuadAmplitude
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_AMPLITUDE(int waveQuad, float amplitude);Parameters:waveQuad: The wave quad indexamplitude: The amplitude valueReturns: Returns true on success.Examples:Lualocal success = SetWaveQuadAmplitude(0, 1.0)
codeBlocks:
// SetWaveQuadAmplitude
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_AMPLITUDE(int waveQuad, float amplitude);
